channel.title: Need server help
channel.description:
okay so whats up.. i just had a couple quick questions about my rs2 server and help would be appriciated!! im kind of a newb so dont flame me :) ok so what i was wondering... for my very first server ive (tried) to make,i browsed 1 or 2 pages of sources, and decided to use the chassyscape source (very cool!) released by mopars own forum mod ,chassy!
so my first question is, how do you make npcs talk?! :P in chassyscape it theirs a talking npc that says "chassy is OFFLINE" (or online but this isint the real chassyscape so i doubt chassy will be online in it) how can i change the text for this? if i cant figure out how, ill just delete it :o dont wanna be a (total) leach anyway.
second question, how do you change the home area?
just some names of files to open and edit would be really usefull even if you dont know exactly what to do :)
PS. i cant figure out how to make myself owner :( :o
character-rights = 0 normal player character-rights = 1 moderator character-rights = 2 administrator character-rights = 3 co-owner
but if i put it to character-rights = 4 , and log in, it gives me the status of a normal player :o any way im really a newb soo constructive criticism will be welcome :D thanks!
------ EDIT ------
i changed the character rights to 5, and items could still be spawned. i figure this is hidden admin? when changed to 6,7, etc., my status of logging in wasnt even displayed, but items could still be spawned.
character-rights = 5, it displays the message Adam has logged in (adam is my username lol) character-rights = 4, it displays the message Co-Owner adam has logged in
but when character-rights = [i][b]6[/b][/i] it displays no message but like i said items still can be spawned..

item.title: Need server help
item.dc:creator: @sneakyscape sneakyscape
item.description:
@sneakyscape wrote:

ohhhh lol! well now i know what that little “compile” icon is for!!! lol

Read full topic

item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

Ofcourse, otherwise the changes you make won’t be in effect. =)

Read full topic

item.title: Need server help
item.dc:creator: @sneakyscape sneakyscape
item.description:
@sneakyscape wrote:

no :o
im just playing on hamachi right now dude caus my laptops broken lol… do you need to compile anyway?

Read full topic

item.title: Need server help

Oh no, just deal with the playerrights.

item.description:
@sneakyscape wrote:

so you think it might just be chassys server? should i get a new source?

Read full topic

item.title: Need server help
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

Nah, you are not dumb. And my bad, i don’t even mess with servers anymore
Chassys’ server is weird

Read full topic

item.title: Need server help
item.dc:creator: @sneakyscape sneakyscape
item.description:
@sneakyscape wrote:

AH! dude thanks lol! i could have sworn i searched through every text file and Ctrl+f’d chassy and stuff… wow… im dumb! lol!

PS… when character-rights = 3, it says “co-owner adam has logged in”

when character-rights = 4 it says “Adam has logged in”…

…so i went in npchandler.java , and FOUND all the text and stuff that i see in the game… i edited it and saved it but none of it changed in the server? SIGGHHHH… oh well i know im a noob and its probably hard to explain to me but respond if you have the time

Read full topic

item.title: Need server help
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

To make npcs talk, search chassy in offline in npchandler.java and you can go from there.

Home area, change the login place in player.java i think or playerhandler and search the coords and then change the area, but your gonna have to move everything like objects if you want them too, in client.java by searching makeGlobal (i think)

And owner, 0= normal, 1 = moderator, 2 = administrator, 3 = owner.
But playerrights 4 is like, an invisible admin, doesn’t give the crown but you can do the commands

Read full topic

okay so whats up… i just had a couple quick questions about my rs2 server and help would be appriciated!!
im kind of a newb so dont flame me

character-rights = 4, it displays the message Co-Owner adam has logged in

but when character-rights = 6 it displays no message but like i said items still can be spawned…
